lead_paragraph: Everyone and his brother is joining M.L.S. these days, with the Premier League veteran Shaun Wright-Phillips now set to join the younger Bradley Wright-Phillips in Harrison.

headline.main: Family, and a Fair Bit of Fortune, Lead Shaun Wright-Phillips to the Red Bulls
headline.print_headline: Family, and a Fair Bit of Fortune, Lead Shaun Wright-Phillips to the Red Bulls

snippet: Everyone and his brother is joining M.L.S. these days, with the Premier League veteran Shaun Wright-Phillips now set to join the younger Bradley Wright-Phillips in Harrison.
